commit.message:
GO-980: add Gin framework frontend (#19)

Previously, go-test-bench only supported the standard library. This
change adds new support to run the application using the Gin
framework.

New code to support Gin resides in cmd/gin. The code intends to
provide parity with the existing standard library implementation in
a Gin native way. In general, new vulnerabilities specific to Gin
will be future work.

Templates are also updated to use composition to avoid multiple
rendering steps.

This change also adds a fake /etc/passwd file when building the Docker
image. This should improve demos involving path traversals using the
default form value in the front-end.

As this work has coincided with agent support for go1.17, this also
updates images/pipelines to use 1.17.

Previously, go-test-bench only supported the standard library. This

New code to support Gin resides in cmd/gin. The code intends to

Templates are also updated to use composition to avoid multiple

This change also adds a fake /etc/passwd file when building the Docker
